descripcion:
The 13-2-13 Seedling Plus is a high nitrate nitrogen formula with potassium, calcium, and magnesium for improved plug quality and color. Ideal for soil less growing. Two types of chelated iron provide nutrient availability over a wide range of water pH.

DERIVED FROM: Calcium Nitrate, Magnesium Nitrate, Potassium Nitrate, Potassium Phosphate, Ammonium Phosphate, Iron EDTA, Iron EDDHA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Urea Phosphate Manganese EDTA, Boric Acid, Sodium Molybdate. F1367

POTENTIAL BASICITY: 370 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.
